mapper.select: SELECT ID, CONTENT FROM common_comments ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT #{count,jdbcType=INTEGER}
SELECT id, title, publish_date, IFNULL(comment_total,'0') comment_total FROM sh_article WHERE date_format(publish_date,'%Y-%c-%d') = str_to_date(#{publishDate},'%Y-%c-%d') ORDER BY publish_date desc
mapper.update: update sh_article set publish_date=#{releaseDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, comment_total=#{comment} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) sum,date_format(adddate,'%Y-%m-%d') cal FROM sh_jnl_article_comment where send_flag='2' group by cal order by cal desc

select sum,cal from (SELECT count(*) sum,date_format(adddate,'%Y-%m-%d') cal FROM sh_jnl_article_comment where send_flag='2' group by cal order by cal desc) tba where date_format(cal,'%Y-%c-%d') = str_to_date(#{todayDate},'%Y-%c-%d')
select sum(cast(comment_total as unsigned integer) ) sum,curdate() cal from sh_article where publish_date > curdate()
select sum(cast(comment_total as unsigned integer) ) sum, curdate() cal from sh_article where 1 = 1 and publish_date > curdate() and category=#{categoryid}
